description: I am an experienced front-end engineer based in Lexington, KY. I enjoy designing interfaces, building websites, and developing web applications.
While I specialize in front-end development, I’m interested in doing more full stack development with either PHP or JavaScript frameworks.
These are just a few technologies I’ve worked with:

positions.title: Content Management Programmer
responsibilities: Building WordPress themes and plugins for clinical websites.
Helping create UI/UX standards for React applications.
Providing technical support for our websites, SharePoint sites, and applications.

positions.title: Drupal Developer
responsibilities: Responsible for designing, building, and managing the College of Engineering's primary, departmental and lab Drupal websites.
I also help support faculty and staff with any web requests.

positions.title: Web & Application Developer
responsibilities: I was responsible for Drupal site management, theming, and module development for the College of Arts & Sciences website.
I developed JavaScript applications for use within the College (mainly React + Node.js applications but also a couple Meteor.js projects).
In addition to my development responsibilities, I also helped College faculty and staff with website support tickets.

positions.title: Front-End Developer
responsibilities: I built the front-end user interface for an online directory and giving application for churches and non-profits using Ember.js.
I helped migrate marketing sites from Drupal 6 to Drupal 8 and built a customized child theme for the new Drupal 8 site.
